meanings.definition: A person or group of people who are considered unpleasant or despicable.
meanings.sent1: Those fuckers always ruin our plans.
meanings.sent2: I can't stand those fuckers who gossip all the time.
meanings.sent3: The fuckers at the office keep stealing my lunch!
meanings.sent4: The politicians are a bunch of corrupt fuckers.
meanings.sent5: The movie villain was one of the most despicable fuckers I've ever seen.

meanings.definition: Used as an expletive to express anger, frustration, or emphasis.
meanings.sent1: Fuckers! I can't believe I missed the bus again.
meanings.sent2: Oh, fuckers! I forgot my keys at home.
meanings.sent3: Well, fuckers, looks like we're in for a long night of work.
meanings.sent4: In the heat of the moment, all I could shout was 'fuckers!'
meanings.sent5: When the cake fell on the floor, I just yelled 'fuckers!' in frustration.
